DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the therapeutic effectiveness and cost-effectivity of pharmaceutical care for diabetes type 2 patients. Patients will be randomly allocated to the control group ( = no input from pharmacist) or intervention group ( = with pharmaceutical care at baseline and follow-up visits over 6 months).
DOC.brief_title: Pharmaceutical Care for Diabetes Type 2 Patients: a Randomised Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: 4575 years Body Mass Index >= 25 Diabetes treatment for at least 12 months Regular visitors of the participating community pharmacy Patients taking only insulin (no oral antidiabetic drugs)
